content: Hello! I'm new to FHIR in general and I was wondering if someone could point me to some resources or advice on how I should approach the problem I have. I'm looking to describe a chat bot as participant of patient's encounter. I feel it should be part of Individuals in Administration module, however I'm not sure if it is the correct to way to approach it, or should it be rather a modifying extension for practitioner resource type(as the bot is capable of carrying out triage). I would appreciate if someone could point me in the right direction. Thanks!
hi Adrian, software is usually considered to be a Device
